bonuses.text: Catching event-themed Pokémon in the wild may award items such as Fast TMs, Charged TMs, Silver Pinap Berries, Golden Razz Berries, and Rare Candy

Additional items may be rewarded from opening Gifts

50% more XP for winning Raid Battles
2× XP from catching Pokémon

features: The following Pokémon first discovered in the Galar region will make their Pokémon GO debuts!
You can use 25 Rolycoly Candy to evolve Rolycoly into Carkol and 100 Rolycoly Candy to evolve Carkol into Coalossal.
A special Winter Weekend event will take place during Winter Holiday Part 2 from Saturday, December 27, at 10:00 a.m. to Sunday, December 28, 2025, at 8:00 p.m. local time!

heading: GO Battle League

bonuses.text: Increased Spawns
1/4 Hatch Distance
3-hour Incense*
1-hour Lures**

bonusDisclaimers:
* The three-hour Incense bonus excludes Daily Adventure Incense.
** Lure Modules will last for one hour and may attract the featured Pokémon. While most bonuses are only active during the three-hour event period, these will be active from 2:00 p.m. to 9:00 p.m. local time.

features: During this event, festive fireworks will light up the skies. We hope you enjoy the colorful decor!

The number of guaranteed Lucky Pokémon a Trainer can receive in a trade has been increased from 35 to 45! Beginning with this event, if you trade a Pokémon that has been in a Trainer’s Pokémon storage since 2020, it is guaranteed to become a Lucky Pokémon until the limit is reached! This change is permanent.
Blacephalon encountered after five-star raids during the event will know the Charged Attack Mind Blown!
Mind Blown

paragraphs: May encounter event-themed Pokémon in the wild, including Party Hat Bulbasaur, Ribbon Jigglypuff, New Years Hat Hoothoot and more!
You might even encounter Party Top Hat Pikachu!

paragraphs: Event-themed Field Research tasks will be available.
Complete Field Research tasks to earn Stardust.
During the event, Trainers will receive one bonus daily Field Research task each day they log in that awards either one Lucky Egg or one Incense.
*To obtain bonus Field Research tasks, you must have three or fewer active Field Research tasks when you log in for the first time each day.

For US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), you’ll be able to access event-exclusive Timed Research. Purchasing this ticket will also grant a bonus during the New Year’s 2026 event (see Bonuses section above).
Timed Research rewards include the following.
lists:

paragraphs: The following avatar item will be available to purchase in the in-game shop during this event and will continue to be available after the event ends!
Blacephalon Boots
The New Year’s 2026 Ultra Ticket Box will be available for US$1.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency) and includes an event ticket and one Lucky Egg!
Check it out in the Pokémon GO Web Store!

featured.name: Genesect (Burn Drive), Genesect (Chill Drive) Raid Hour

bonuses.text: Reshiram, Zekrom, Black Kyurem* and White Kyurem* will appear more frequently in raids, and these Raid Bosses will alternate each half hour during event hours. Reshiram and Black Kyurem will appear in raids first, followed by Zekrom and White Kyurem
Receive up to five additional free Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a total of six)
Increased chance to encounter Shiny Reshiram, Shiny Zekrom, and Shiny Kyurem in raids
The Remote Raid Pass limit will increase to 20 from Friday, January 9, at 5:00 p.m. to Saturday, January 10, 2026, at 8:00 p.m. PST
Eight additional Raid Passes from spinning Gym Photo Discs (for a daily total of 14)
Increased chance to get Rare Candy XL from Raid Battles
50% more XP from Raid Battles
2× Stardust from Raid Battles
2× XP for catching Pokémon
Increased chance of encountering Shiny Corphish, Shiny Dwebble, and Shiny Clauncher

features: Klawf, the Ambush Pokémon, will make its Pokémon GO debut!
Also, for the first time in Pokémon GO, you’ll be able to encounter Shiny Dhelmise—if you’re lucky!

General.info: Event-themed Pokémon will appear in three unique habitats during the event. When you purchase your ticket, you’ll select which habitat you’d like to start your day in. You’ll be able to visit all three habitats during your event day! A map of the venue, including the habitat locations, will be available closer to the event.

sales: A limited number of Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos T-shirts will be available for purchase at the event! By purchasing a Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos T-shirt in person, you’ll also receive a voucher card with a redemption code for an exclusive matching GO Tour T-shirt avatar item.
Preorders will not be available for Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Tainan. Quantities are limited. No returns or exchanges will be allowed.

name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026
heading: Pokémon GO Tour

eventInfo.name: Mega Night at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Tainan 2026

General.info: Some Trainers might even encounter the following!

name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026
heading: Pokémon GO Tour

eventInfo.name: Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos - Los Angeles 2026

General.info: Event-themed Pokémon will appear in three unique habitats during the event. When you purchase your ticket, you’ll select which habitat you’d like to start your day in. Don’t worry, you’ll be able to visit all three habitats during your event day! A map of the venue, including the habitat locations, will be available closer to the event.

sales: We are thrilled to offer Trainers a wider selection than ever before of apparel and accessories at Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos – Los Angeles. All items are available via preorder only, and must be picked up at Rose Bowl Stadium during your ticketed event day.
Purchased your ticket already and forgot to add merchandise? No need to worry, you can go back and complete additional purchases for add-ons so long as supplies last.
Quantities are limited, and preorders will only be available while supplies last. No returns, exchanges, or cancellations will be allowed.

season.name: Precious Paths
specialResearch: The Precious Paths Special Research will be available to claim from Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, March 3, 2026, at 9:59 a.m. local time.
New parts of the Special Research will unlock over the course of the Season, so make sure to keep an eye on your research tab!
Complete the Season Special Research to earn encounters with Sprigatito, Fuecoco, and Quaxly!
For US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), Trainers will receive a Special Research granting a Master Ball as one of the rewards.
Receiving a rare and powerful Master Ball is a special occasion—think wisely about how you’ll use it, and keep a lookout for future opportunities in Pokémon GO to acquire more!
features: The Precious Paths Special Research will be available to claim from Tuesday, December 2, 2025, at 10:00 a.m. to Tuesday, March 3, 2026, at 9:59 a.m. local time.
New parts of the Special Research will unlock over the course of the Season, so make sure to keep an eye on your research tab!
For US$7.99 (or the equivalent pricing tier in your local currency), Trainers will receive a Special Research granting a Master Ball as one of the rewards.
Receiving a rare and powerful Master Ball is a special occasion—think wisely about how you’ll use it, and keep a lookout for future opportunities in Pokémon GO to acquire more!
New Pokémon have been spotted in Pokémon GO! Sudowoodo wearing holiday attire, Charjabug wearing holiday attire, Clobbopus, Grapploct, and more make their debuts throughout the season!
New Dynamax and Gigantamax Pokémon make their Pokémon GO debut! Challenge and catch Dynamax Hitmonlee, Dynamax Hitmonchan, Gigantamax Meowth, and more this Season!
Mark your calendar! Precious Paths will have Community Day events on the following dates:
GO Pass, a limited-time progression track, will be available during Precious Paths! Complete Pass Tasks to earn GO Points to increase your rank and earn rewards.
The GO Pass Deluxe, a paid version of GO Pass, will be available for Trainers looking for upgraded rewards and faster progression.
Tier 1 (Rank 25):
Tier 2 (Rank 50):
Tier 3 (Rank 75):
Tier 1 (Upgraded):
The GO Battle League returns as part of Precious Paths! Get your Pokémon ready to battle in competitions such as the Holiday Cup, Sunshine Cup, Love Cup, and more!
Visit the GO Battle League web page for the schedule and more info!
Pokémon GO Tour: Kalos lands in 2026! Experience two in-person Pokémon GO events, then join millions of Trainers around the world for the global finale!
Complete Field Research to unlock Research Breakthrough encounters with one of the following Pokémon.
Be on the lookout for PokéStop Showcases throughout Pokémon GO: Precious Paths. Log in to find out which Pokémon you can show off!

name: Great League, Ultra League, and Master League: Mega Edition | Precious Paths
heading: GO Battle League
